solution_line_template: Kayla bought {theresa_chocolate_bars} chocolate bars / {twice_factor} = <<{theresa_chocolate_bars}/{twice_factor}={kayla_chocolate_bars}>>{kayla_chocolate_bars} chocolate bars.
